resources.string: I-%1$s iye yasuswa ngoba ukuphathwa kwedivayisi akuzange kuqedelwe
Ukuthenga ngaphakathi nohlelo ngeke kudluliselwe ku-^1 yakho.
Okunye ukuthenga ngaphakathi nohlelo kungenzeka kungadluliseli ku-^1 yakho.

"Okudumile kuphela, izinhlelo zokusebenza ze-iOSÂ® ezimahhala zingafaniswa nezinhlelo zokusebenza ze-Android. Ukuthenga okuningi kwangaphakathi nohlelo ngeke kudluliselwe. Ungathola izinhlelo zokusebenza eziningi ku-Google Play Isitolo uma ukusetha sekuqedile.
Ungahle udinge ukunika ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza imvume yangaphambili ukuze ufinyelele eminye imisebenzi noma ulwazi kudivayisi yakho. Izimvume zihlelwe ngamaqembu ezimvume. Ngokukhetha ukufaka lezi zinhlelo zokusebenza, wamukela izimvume eziyingxenye zeqembu ngalinye. Incazelo yeqembu lemvume ngayinye inikezwe ngezansi.
Ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza zingahle zingadingi izimvume zokwamukela ngaphambilini. Uma usebenzisa elilodwa lalezi zinhlelo zokusebenza, ungavumela noma unqabele imvume ngayinye ngaphambi kokuthi uhlelo lokusebenza lusebenzise lolo hlobo lwedatha.
^1"
Ngokufaka uhlelo lokusebenza ngalunye, uyavumelana nezimvume zayo. Funda kabanzi
Ukuphathwa kwedivayisi akuzange kuqedwe. Qalela kabusha uphinde ungene ngemvume futhi.
Ukuphathwa kwedivayisi akukwazanga ukuqedelelwa. Qala kabusha uphinde ungene ngemvume futhi.
Isizinda sakho sidinga ukuphathwa kwedivayisi yeselula, kodwa asisekelwe kule divayisi. Zama ukusebenzisa i-akhawunti ehlukile.
Ukuphathwa kwedivayisi akuzange kungene ngokufanelekile. Qala kabusha uphinde ungene ngemvume futhi.
Ukuphathwa kwedivayisi akuzange kuqedwe. Qalela kabusha uphinde ungene ngemvume futhi.
Ngokuqhubeka, uvumela lolu hlelo lokusebenza ne-Google ukuthi zisebenzise ulwazi lakho ngokuhambisana kahle nemigomo yazo yesevisi nezinqubomgomo zemfihlo.
Thinta inombolo eboniswa kwesinye isikrini. Lokhu kuzokungenisa ngemvume kukhompyutha.
Khetha i-akhawunti ozama ukungena kuyo nge-:
Kukhompyutha yakho, chofoza okuthi \"Unekhodi?\", bese uthayiphe:
Ingabe uye wazama ukungena ngemvume manje ku-Google?
Ivumela ukusetha kabusha kwephasiwedi kusuka e-%s?
I-Google imise umzamo wokusetha kabusha iphasiwedi.
Thinta inombolo eboniswayo kwesinye isikrini. Lokhu kuzosetha kabusha iphasiwedi yakho.
Othile ucele ukusetha kabusha iphasiwedi yakho ye-akhawunti ye-Google. I-Google imise umzamo wokusetha kabusha iphasiwedi.
Ingabe ucele ukusetha kabusha iphasiwedi yakho kusuka e-%s?
Lolu hlobo lwe-akhawunti luphethwe inhlangano yakho.
Idivayisi yakho ixhumana ne-Google ukuze ilondoloze ulwazi ku-akhawunti yakho. Lokhu kungathatha amaminithi afika kwangu-5.
Kopisha ama-akhawunti nedatha kuya kudivayisi yakho?
Ngemuva kokuthi uqinisekise, i-Bluetooth izovulwa ukuze amadivayisi wakho akwazi ukuxhumana.
Ngemuva kokuthi uqinisekise, amadivayisi wakho azoxhumeka nge-Bluetooth.
Ukuze uqhubeke, isikrini sakho sizokhiywa futhi uzodinga ukuthi usivule ukuze siqinisekiswe.
Ayikwazi Ukuthepha Nokuhamba ngoba awekho ama-akhawunti kule divayisi.
Ayikwazi Ukuthepha Nokuhamba ngoba i-Bluetooth ayitholakali kudivayisi yakho.
I-Bluetooth izovulwa ukuze amadivayisi wakho akwazi ukuxhumana.
Ayikwazi ukuthepha nokubuyisa kusuka kuphrofayela yomsebenzisi ekhawulelwe.
Ukuze uqhubeke, thepha KULUNGILE kwenye idivayisi yakho
Le akhawunti idinga ukuphathwa kwedivayisi yeselula. Faka uhlelo lokusebenza lwe-^1 ukuphoqelela izinqubomgomo ezidingwa yi-akhawunti.

Ukuze ungeze i-akhawunti kule divayisi, qala ufake i-^1". I-
^1 ikusiza ukuthi usethele ingane yakho le divayisi."
Usengaqhubeka usethe ngaphandle kwalolu hlelo lokusebenza
Ukuphathwa kwedivayisi kuhlulekile ukufakwa. Le akhawunti izosuswa. Zama futhi emuva kwesikhathi.
Le akhawunti idinga ukuphathwa kwedivayisi. Qhubeka ngaphandle kwayo?
Ukungeza le akhawunti kudinga ukuphathwa kwedivayisi. Ungathanda ukuqalisa futhi nge-akhawunti ehlukile?
Ukuze ufinyelele i-akhawunti yakho yomsebenzi kule divayisi, uzodinga ukusetha isikrini sokukhiya. Le yinqubo yedivayisi yeselula yenhlangano yakho.
Le akhawunti idinga ukuvikelwa kokukhiya isikrini. Ungathanda ukuphinda uqalise nge-akhawunti ehlukile?
Le akhawunti idinga ukuphathwa kwedivayisi yeselula. Uma uthepha Okulandelayo, uhlelo lokusebenza lwe-^1 lizokusiza ukuphoqelela izinqubomgomo zokuphepha ezidingelwa i-akhawunti.

Ukuze ungeze i-akhawunti kule divayisi, sebenzisa i-^1". I-
^1 ikusiza ukuthi usethele ingane yakho le divayisi."
Le akhawunti idinga ukuphathwa kwedivayisi yeselula. Ukuze unelise izinqubomgomo zokuvikela eziphathelene ne-akhawunti, kufanele ufake inguqulo entsha yohlelo lokusebenza lwe-^1.

Ukuze ungeze i-akhawunti kule divayisi, qala ufake inguqulo yakamuva ye-^1". I-
^1 ikusiza ukuthi usethele ingane yakho le divayisi."

"Le akhawunti ikhutshaziwe.
(Ukuze uthole imininingwane, vakashela http://google.com/accounts ngesiphequluli sewebhu.)"

"Le akhawunti ayiqinisekisiwe. Sicela uhlole i-imeyili kwikhompyutha bese ulandela isixhumanisi ukuqinisekisa le-akhawunti.
(Ukubuyisa ulwazi lakho lwe-akhawunti, iya ku-http//google.com/accounts/recovery ekhompyutheni yakho.)"
Le phasiwedi ayinawo amandla noma iqukethe izinhlamvu ezingalungile. Sicela uzame futhi.

"Kube nenkinga ukuxhumana namaseva we-Google.
Zama futhi emuva kwesikhathi."
Sebenzisa iphasiwedi eqondile yohlelo lokusebenza kunokusebenzisa iphasiwedi ye-akhawunti evamile.

"Igama lakho lokusebenza kanye nephasiwedi akufani. Zama futhi.
Ukuphinde utakule ulwazi le-akhawunti yakho, iya ku-google.com/accounts/recovery/."
Ukuze ufinyelele ku-akhawunti yakho, kuzomele ungene ngemvume kuwebhu. Thepha Okulandelayo ukuze uqale ukungena ngemvume Kwesiphequluli.

"Awunalo uxhumo lenethiwekhi.
Lokhu kungaba inkinga yesikhashana. Zama futhi noma xhuma kwenye inethiwekhi ye-Wi-Fi."
Isivele ikhona i-akhawunti ^1 kule divayisi ye-Android.
Ayikwazi ukungena ngemvume kudivayisi yakho ngenxa yoshintsho lwephasiwedi lwakamuva. Sicela uzame ukungena ngemvume futhi emahoreni angu-24 ngemuva kokushintshwa kwephasiwedi.

Ukuhambisa i-akhawunti ye-Google yokugcina kudivayisi kusukela kuphrofayela yakho yomuntu siqu kuzokhubaza izici zokuvikela ukuntshontshwa. Ungangeza enye i-akhawunti kudivayisi ukuze uphinde uzinikeze amandla futhi ngemuva kwesikhathi.
Ayikwazi ukungena ngemvume kudivayisi ngenxa yephutha elingaziwa. Sicela uzame enye i-akhawunti noma zama ukungena ngemvume futhi ngemuva kwamahora angu-24.
Sicela ungene ngemvume usebenzisa eyodwa yama-akhawunti womnikazi kule divayisi
Engeza i-^1 kudivayisi yakho manje? Uma unenye i-akhawunti, ungayingeza ngemuva kwesikhathi.
Le akhawunti ayikwazanga ukufinyelelwa. Qinisekisa ukuthi idivayisi yakho ilandela izinqubomgomo zenhlangano yakho zokuphepha. Uma uqhubeka nokubona leli phutha, xhumana nomqondisi wenhlangano yakho.
" Isizinda sakho sidinga ukuphathwa kwedivayisi yeselula. Faka uhlelo lokusebenza lwe-\"Google Apps Device Policy\" ukuze usebenzise izinqubomgomo zokuvikela ezidingwa yi-akhawunti ye- "^1 .
" "^1" ingaqukatha kuphela amagama, izinombolo, kanye nezikhathi."
" "i-^1 iqukethe ngaphansi kokungu-6 noma okuningi kunezinhlamvu ezingu-30.
" I-akhawunti "^1 kufanele ingezwe kudivayisi noma iphrofayela elawulwa inhlangano yakho. Sicela ulandele imiyalo enikezwe umawuli wakho we-IT ukuze uqedele lokhu.
Uhlamvu olungavumelekile. Kuvunyelwe u-0-9, a-z, A-Z, nezikhathi kuphela.
Umbhalo owuthayiphile awulona igama lomsebenzisi elivumelekile.

Ngokuqhubeka, uyavuma ukuthi le divayisi ingalanda ngokuzenzakalelayo futhi ifake izibuyekezo nezinhlelo zokusebenza kusuka ku-Google, inkampani yakho yenethiwekhi, nomkhiqizi wale divayisi, kungasebenzisa idatha yeselula. Ezinye zalezi zinhlelo zokusebenza zinganikela ngokuthenga okuphakathi nohlelo. Ungasusa lezo zinhlelo zokusebenza noma kunini.
Khulula isikhala uma isitoreji sedivayisi cishe sesigcwele ngokukhipha idatha kusuka kudivayisi, njengezithombe namavidiyo enziwe isipele.

Yenza isipele idatha yedivayisi ngokuzenzakalelayo (njengamaphasiwedi e-WiâFi nomlando wokushaya) nedatha yohlelo lokusebenza (njengezilungiselelo namafayela alondolozwe izinhlelo zokusebenza) ku-Google Drayivu yengane yakho.

"Uma uvula isipele ngokuzenzakalela, idivayisi nedatha yohlelo lokusebenza ilondolozwa ngezikhathi ezithile kufolda eyimfihlo ku-Google Drayivu. Idatha yohlelo lokusebenza ingaba inoma iyiphi idatha elondolozwe uhlelo lokusebenza (kusukela kuzilungiselelo zonjiniyela), efaka idatha enamandla okuzwela efana noxhumana nabo, imilayezo, nezithombe.
Idatha yesipele ngeke ize ibalwe ngokubhekiswe ku-quota yesitoreji sakho seDrayivu. Amafayela amakhulu, amafayela akhethwe onjiniyela ukuthi akhishwe kusukela kusevisi ngeke enziwe isipele."

Yenza isipele ngokuzenzakalela idatha yedivayisi" (efana namaphasiwedi e-Wi-Fi, i-SMS nomlando wekholi), izilungiselelo nedatha yohlelo lokusebenza (efana nezilungiselelo namafayela agcinwe izinhlelo zokusebenza) ku-Google Drayivu yengane yakho."

Njengomzali, ungavula noma uvale lawo masevisi noma kunini ku-akhawunti yengane yakho. Idatha izosetshenziswa ngokuya ngezinqubomgomo" ze-Google.
Uma ufuna ukufunda kabanzi, ungathepha isevisi ngayinye."
Sebenzisa isevisi yendawo ye-Google ukuze usize izinhlelo zokusebenza zinqume indawo yengane yakho. Idatha engaziwa yendawo izothunyelwa ku-Google uma le divayisi ivuliwe.

"Isevisi yendawo ye-Google isebenzisa imithombo efana ne-WiâFi namanethiwekhi eselula ukusiza ukulinganisa indawo yedivayisi ngokushesha nangokuqondile. Le sevisi iyasebenza uma isilungiselelo sendawo sale divayisi sivuliwe futhi ikumodi esebenzisa amanethiwekhi e-WiâFi noma eselula ukulinganisela indawo, njengokuqonda okuphezulu noma imodi yokulondoloza ibhethri (Ukonga amandla).
Ungavala le sevisi ngokuthi:
"
Uvale isilungiselelo sendawo esinkulu kule divayisi."
"
Ukushiya isilungiselelo esinkulu sendawo sivuliwe nokukhetha imodi esebenzisa i-GPS kuphela, kwesinye isikhathi okubizwa ngokuthi Idivayisi kuphela.

Siza ukuthuthukisa umuzwa wakho we-Android ngokuthumela ngokuzenzakalelayo idatha yokuxilonga neyedivayisi nokusetshenziswa kohlelo lokusebenza ku-Google. Lokhu ngeke kusetshenziswe ukukhomba ingane yakho futhi kuzosiza ukuthuthukisa impilo yebhethri, ukuqina kohlelo lokusebenza, uxhumo lwenethiwekhi, nokuningi.

"Lolu ulwazi oluvamile mayelana nale divayisi nokuthi lusetshenziswa kanjani (nejngeleveli yebhethri, ukusetshenziswa kohlelo lokusebenza, noxhumo lenethiwekhi). Idatha izosetshenziselwa ukuthuthuksa imikhiqizo namasevisi e-Google kuwo wonke umuntu. Olunye ulwazi olubaliwe luzosiza ozakwethu, njengonjiniyela be-Android, ukwenza ngcono izinhlelo zabo zokusebenza nemikhiqizo, futhi.
Ukuvala lesi sici akuthinti amandla wale divayisi okuthumela ulwazi oludingekayo kumasevisi abalulekile njengezibuyekezo zesistimu nokuphepha."

"Lolu ulwazi oluvamile mayelana nale divayisi nokuthi lusetshenziswa kanjani (nejngeleveli yebhethri, ukusetshenziswa kohlelo lokusebenza, noxhumo lenethiwekhi). Idatha izosetshenziselwa ukuthuthuksa imikhiqizo namasevisi e-Google kuwo wonke umuntu. Olunye ulwazi olubaliwe luzosiza ozakwethu, njengonjiniyela be-Android, ukwenza ngcono izinhlelo zabo zokusebenza nemikhiqizo, futhi.
Ukuvala lesi sici akuthinti amandla edivayisi okuthumela ulwazi oludingekayo kumasevisi abalulekile njengezibuyekezo zesistimu nokuphepha.
Ungalawula lesi sici kusuka kuzilungiselelo > Google. Ukhethe ukusetshenziswa nokuxilonga kusuka kumenyu."
Uthayiphe iphasiwedi engalungile noma i-akhawunti yakho ishintshile. Thayipha kabusha iphasiwedi yakho. Uma ukhohlwe iphasiwedi yakho futhi udinga ukuphinda utholei-akhawunti yakho chofoza lapha.
Lokhu kungaba inkinga yesikhashana noma idivayisi yakho ye-Android ayilungiselwe amasevisi edatha. Uma kuqhubeka, shayela ukunakekela kwekhasimende.
Lokhu kungase kube inkinga yesikhashana noma idivayisi yakho ye-Android ingase ingalungiselelwa amasevisi edatha. Zama futhi uma usuxhumeke kwinethiwekhi yefoni, noma xhuma kwinethiwekhi ye-Wi-Fi.
Le kungaba inkinga yesikhashana. Zama futhi noma xhuma kwenye inethiwekhi ye-Wi-Fi.

Uma ukhohlwa iphasiwedi yakho noma kukhona into entsha mayelana nokungena kwakho ngemvume, i-Google ingacela ikhodi yokuvikela ukuze ivikele i-akhawunti yakho. Isebenzise manje noma buya ukuze uthole entsha.
Ingasetshenziswa nini le khodi ukuze kungenwe ngemvume
I-akhawunti yakho yakwa-Google isidaliwe kodwa isicelo sakho sokudala iphrofayela ye-Google+ asithumelekanga. Zama futhi emuva kwesikhathi kunoma isiphi isiphequluli sewebhu ku-plus.google.com.
Isicelo sakho sokujoyina i-Google+ asithumelekanga. Zama futhi emuva kwesikhathi kusuka kunoma yisiphi isiphequluli sewebhu ku-plus.google.com.
Kube khona inkinga yokuxhumaniseka namaseva e-Google.
I-akhawunti yakho ingeziwe. Sicela uqhubeke ukuze ukhethe izinketho zamasevisi e-Google

Ngokuqhubeka, uyavuma ukuthi le divayisi ingalanda ngokuzenzakalela futhi ifake izibuyekezo nezinhlelo zokusebenza kusuka ku-Google, inkampani yakho yenethiwe, nomkhiqizi wedivayisi yakho, kungenzeka ukuthi kusebenzisa idatha yeselula. Ezinye zalezi zinhlelo zokusebenza zinikezela ngokuthenga okuphakathi nohlelo. Ungasusa lezo zinhlelo zokusebenza noma kunini.

Ukuze ususe izinhlelo zokusebenza, iya kuzilungiselelo > isiphathi sezinhlelo zokusebenza noma uhlelo lokusebenza. Bese uthephe uhlelo lokusebenza ofuna ukulikhipha (ungadinga ukuswayiphela ngakwesokudla noma ngakwesokunxele ukuze uthole uhlelo lokusebenza). Bes uthephe okuthi Khipha noma Khubaza.

Futhi uyavuma futhi unika imvume izinhlelo zokusebenza ze-Google ezilayishwe ngaphambilini ukuthi zifinyelele ulwazi nemisebenzi kudivayisi yakho. Bona leli khasi ngolwazi olubanzi ekusebenziseni kwalezo zimvume.
Uma isitoreji sefoni yakho cishe sesigcwele, khulula isikhala ngokususa enye idatha, njengezithombe ezenziwe isipele namavidiyo.
Uma uxhumekile, ungasafinyelela le datha. Ungalawula lesi sici nokususiwe ngokuya kuzilungiselelo > isitoreji > Isitoreji esihlakaniphile.
Buyisa kalula noma shintsha amafoni noma kunini. Isipele sibandakanya izinhlelo zokusebenza, idatha yohlelo lokusebenza, nezilungiselelo zedivayisi (kufaka phakathi amaphasiwedi e-WiâFi).

"Idatha yohlelo lokusebenza kungaba inoma iyiphi idatha elondolozwe uhlelo lokusebenza (kusukela kuzilungiselelo zonjiniyela), okufaka idatha engazwela efana noxhumana nabo, imilayezo, nezithombe.
Idatha yesipele ngeke ibale kuya kusitoreji sakho seDrayivu.
Ungavala le sevisi kuzilungiselelo."

"Idatha yohlelo lokusebenza kungaba inoma iyiphi idatha elondolozwe uhlelo lokusebenza (kusukela kuzilungiselelo zonjiniyela), okufaka idatha engazwela efana noxhumana nabo, imilayezo, nezithombe.
Izithombe namavidiyo kusukela kule divayisi zivunyelaniswa nezithombe ze-Google ukuze kuseshwe, kuhlelwe, kususwe, kuphinde kwabiwe kusukela kunoma imaphi amadivayisi akho. Ngokuzenzakalela, izithombe namavidiyo okulungiswa okugcwele ayalayishwa.
Idatha yesipele ngeke ibale ngokuya ku-quota yesitoreji sakho seDrayivu.
Ungavala le sevisi kuzilungiselelo."

Buyisela kalula noma shintsha amafoni noma kunini. Isipele sifaka izinhlelo zokusebenza, idatha yohlelo lokusebenza, umlando wekholi, oxhumana nabo, nezilungiselelo zedivayisi (okufaka amaphasiwedi e-Wi-Fi nezimvume).

Buyisela kalula noma shintsha amafoni noma kunini. Ukwenza isipele kufaka izinhlelo zokusebenza, idatha yohlelo lokusebenza, umlando wekholi, oxhumana nabo, izilungiselelo zedivayisi (okufaka amaphasiwedi e-Wi-Fi nezimvume), ne-SMS.

Buyisela kalula noma shintsha amafoni noma kunini. Ukwenza isipele kufaka izinhlelo zokusebenza, idatha yohlelo lokusebenza, umlando wekholi, oxhumana nabo, izilungiselelo zedivayisi (okufaka amaphasiwedi e-Wi-Fi nezimvume), izithombe, amavidiyo, ne-SMS. Izithombe namavidiyo avunyelaniswa ku-akhawunti yakho ye-Google futhi angasetshenziswa kumasevisi onkana.
Thepha ukuze ufunde kabanzi ngesevisi ngayinye, njengokuthi uyivala noma uyivula kanjani kamuva. Idatha izosetshenziswa ngokuya ngenqubomgomo yobumfihlo ye-Google.

"Imininingwane yohlelo lokusebenza kufaka phakathi ukuthenga okuphakathi nohlelo ingatholakala ku-Google Play Isitolo. Idatha yohlelo lokusebenza nezilungiselelo kuvumelanisa kumadivayisi akho angene ngemvume nge-akhawunti yakho ye-Google.
Ukusetshenziswa kwama-app asheshayo kubuswa "yimigomo yesevisi ye-GoogleÂ Play". "Funda kabanzi.
Uma uthepha isixhumanisi, i-Google Play ihlola ukuthi ingabe ikhona i-app esheshayo futhi esebenzayo ngaphandle kokufaka. Ama-app asheshayo agcinwa kudivayisi yakho okwesikhashana.
Sebenzisa isevisi yendawo ye-Google ukusiza izinhlelo zokusebenza zicacise indawo yakho. Idatha yendawo engaziwa izothunyelwa ku-Google uma idivayisi yakho ivulekile.

"Isevisi yendawo ye-Google isebenzisa izisetshenziswa ezifana ne-WiâFi namanethwekhi eselula ukusiza ukulinganisela indawo yedivayisi yakho ngokushesha nangokunembile. Le sevisi iyasebenza uma isilungiselelo sendawo yedivayisi yakho sivulekile futhi sikumodi esebenzisa i-WiâFi noma amanethiwekhi eselula ukulinganisela indawo, njengokunemba okuphezulu noma imodyi yokonga ibhethri (Ukonga amandla).
Ungavala le sevisi:
"
Ngokuvala isilungiselelo sendawo esiyinhloko kudivayisi yakho."
"
Ngokushiya isethingi sendawo esiyinhloko sivulekile futhi ukhethe imodi esebenzisa i-GPS kuphela, kwesinye isikhathi ibizwa ngokuthi idivayisi kuphela.
Vumela izinhlelo zokusebenza namasevisi ukuskena i-WiâFi, ngisho noma ivaliwe.
Vumela izinhlelo zokusebenza namasevisi ukuskena i-WiâFi ne-Bluetooth, ngisho noma ngabe lezi zilungiselelo zivaliwe.
Ngazise ngezindaba kanye nalokho okunikezwa kusuka ku-Google Play.
Uma uqhubeka, futhi uyavumelana nemigomo yesevisi ye-Google.
Uma usebenzisa le divayisi sibophezeleka ngenqubomgomo yethu yobumfihlo kanye nemigomo engeziwe iyasebenza.

Siza ukuthuthukisa umuzwa wakho we-Android ngokuthumela ngokuzenzakalela idatha yokuxilonga neyedivayisi nohlelo lokusebenza ku-Google. Lokhu kuzosiza ukuthuthukisa impilo yebhethri, amandla ohlelo lokusebenza, uxhumo lenethiwekhi, nokuningi. Uma uvule umsebenzi ongeziwe wewebhu nohlelo lokusebenza, lolu lwazi luzolondoloza nge-akhawunti yakho ukuze uyiphathe kokuthi umsebenzi wami.

"Lolu ulwazi oluvamile ngedivayisi yakho nokuthi uyisebenzisa kanjani (njengeleveli yebhethri, ukusetshenziswa kohlelo lokusebenza, noxhumo lenethiwekhi). Idatha izosetshenziselwa ukuthuthukisa imikhiqizo namasevisi e-Google kuwo wonke umuntu. Olunye ulwazi olubaliwe luzosiza ozakwethu, njengonjiniyela be-Android, ukwenza izinhlelo zabo zokusebenza nemikhiqizo kubengcono, futhi.
Ukuvala lesi sici akuthinti amandla edivayisi yakho okuthumela ulwazi oludungekela amasevisi abalulekile njengezibuyekezo zesistimu nokuphepha."
Ungakwazi ukulawula lesi sici kusuka kokuthi Izilungiselelo ze-Google. Khetha okuthi Ukusetshenziswa nokuhlola kusukela kule menyu.
Ungalawula lesi sici kusuka kuzilungiselelo > Google. Khetha ukusetshenziswa nokuxilongwa kusuka kumenyu.
Vumela izithombe zangemuva ze-Google Live ukuphendula endaweni yakho ngokufinyelela isevisi yendawo ye-Google.

Ungavula noma uvale ukufinyelela kusevisi yendawo ye-Google kuzithombe zangemuva ngokuya kuzilungiselelo > Izinhlelo zokusebenza nezaziso > Ulwazi lohlelo lokusebenza. Kumenyu yokugeleza, thepha okuthi Bonisa isistimu > Izithombe zangemuva zedatha ebukhoma noma izithombe zangemuva ze-Earth ebukhoma > Izimvume.
Ngokungena ngemvume uvumelana ne-Google kanye nezinqubomgomo zangasese ezengeziwe.

"Umkhiqizi wale divayisi usebenzisa izinhlelo zokusebenza ze-Google ngaphandle kokuqinisekisa le divayisi ne-Google.
Amadivayisi angaqinisekisiwe angahle angaphephi futhi angahle angatholi izibuyekezo zesistimu noma zezinhlelo zokusebenza. Izinhlelo zokusebenza nezici, njengokwenza isipele amafayela nezithombe, kungahle kungasebenzi kahle.
Xhumana nomkhiqizi wedivayisi yakho ukuze ulungise le nkinga.
Ungavakashela ku-%s ngolwazi olubanzi ngozakwethu be-Google eqinisekisiwe."
Uma ufaka futhi uhlelo lokusebenza, buyisela okuhlelwe ukusebenza kwezipele kanye nemininingo

string.name: autofill_optin_line1
string.b: Thepha ukuze uvumele i-Google ikugcwalisele lokhu

resources.string: Ngolwazi oseluvele lulondolozwe ekugcwaliseni ngokuzenzakalela kwe-Chrome
"â¢ I-Google isebenzisa okukusikrini sakho ukuze inqume ukuthi yini engagcwaliswa ngokuzenzakalela. â¢ Ungabona uphinde uphathe ulwazi lwakho lokugcwalisa ngokuzenzakalela kuzilungiselelo."
Ngokuthepha okukodwa, gcwalisa amaphasiwedi, amakheli, amakhadi esikweletu, nolunye ulwazi olulondolozwe ku-akhawunti yakho.
Ngokuthepha okukodwa, gcwalisa amaphasiwedi, amakheli, amakhadi esikweletu, nolunye ulwazi olulondolozwe ku-akhawunti yakho (^1).
Ayikho i-akhawunti okwamanje egcina ukusekela ngokulondoloza idatha
Sekela ngokulondoloza idatha yohlelo lokusebenza, amaphasiwedi e-Wi-Fi, nezinye izilungiselelo kudrayivu ye-Google

"Yenza isipele ngokuzenzakalela idatha yedivayisi (njengamaphasiwedi e-Wi-Fi nomlando wekholi) nedatha yohlelo lokusebenza (njengezilungiselelo namafayela alondolozwe yizinhlelo zokusebenza) ngokuzenzakalela.
Uma uvula ukwenza isipele ngokuzenzakalela, idatha yedivayisi neyohlelo lokusebenza isetshenziswa ngokuzenzakalela. Idatha yohlelo lokusebenza kungaba yinoma iyiphi idatha leyo uhlelo lokusebenza elondoloziwe (ngokususelwe kuzilungiselelo zikanjiniyela), kufaka phakathi idatha ezwelayo njengoxhumana nabo, imilayezo nezithombe."
Yeka ukulondoloza amaphasiwedi akho e-Wi-Fi, amabhukhimaki, ezinye izilungiselelo, kanye nedatha yezinhlelo zokusebenza, nokususa onke amakhophi ku-Google drayivu?

Misa ukwenza isipele idatha yedivayisi (efana namaphasiwedi we-Wi-Fi nomlando wekholi) nedatha yohlelo lokusebenza (efana nezilungiselelo namafayela agcinwe yizinhlelo zokusebenza, uphinde ususe wonke amakhophi ku-Google Drayivu?

"Uma uvula ukwenza isipele ngokuzenzakalela:
â Izilungiselelo zedivayisi nedatha yohlelo lokusebenza kulondoloza ngesikhathi kwifolda eyimfihlo ku-Google Drayivu. idatha yohlelo lokusebenza kungaba inoma iyiphi idatha leyo uhlelo lokusebenza elulondolozile (ngokususelwe kuzilungiselelo zikanjiniyela), kufaka phakathi idatha ezwelayo njengoxhumana nabo, imilayezo, kanye nezitombe.
Amafayela amakhulu, noma amafayela onjniyela abakhethe ukuwakhipha kusuka kusevisi, ngeke enziwe isipele.
â Ukurekhodwa kwezithombe namavidiyo kusuka kule divayisi kuvumelaniswa ngelabhulali yakho yezithombe ze-Google ukuze useshe, uhlele, ususe, futhi wabelane kusuka kunoma imaphi amadivayisi akho.
Ngokuzenzakalela, izithombe zokucaca okuphezulu namavidiyo kuyalayishwa. Lokhu akubali kusitoreji sakho sedrayivu.
â Idatha yoxhumana nabo nephathelene kusuka kule divayisi kuvumelaniswa koxhumana nabo be-Google. Ungasebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza loxhumana nabo le-Google ukuze useshe, usule, futhi wabelane ngoxhumana nabo kusuka kunoma imaphi amadivayisi akho.
â Okungenayo kwekhalenda nedatha ephathelene kusuka kule divayisi kuvumelaniswa ku-Google khalenda. Ungasebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza le-Google Ikhalenda ukuze useshe, uhlele, ususe, futhi wabelane ngoxhumana nabo kusuka kumadivayisi akho.
Ukwenza isipele idatha ngeke kubale kusitoreji sedrayivu."

"Uma uvula ukwenza isipele ngokuzenzakalela:
â Izilungiselelo zedivayisi nedatha yohlelo lokusebenza zilondolozwa njalo kufolda eyimfihlo ku-Google Drayivu. Idatha yohlelo lokusebenza kungaba yinoma iyiphi idatha leyo uhlelo lokusebenza eyilondolozile (ngokususelwe kuzilungiselelo zikanjiniyela), kufaka phakathi idatha ezwela kakhulu njengoxhumana nabo, imilayezo, nezithombe.
Amafayela amakhulu, noma amafayela lawo onjiniyela abakhethe ukungawabandakanyi kusuka kusevisi, ngeke enziwe isipele.
â Oxhumana nabo nedatha ephathelene kusuka kule divayisi bavumelaniswa koxhumana nabo be-Google. Ungasebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza loxhumana nabo beYou -Google ukusesha, ukuhlela, ukususa, kanye nokwabelana ngoxhumana nabo kusuka kunoma yimaphi amadivayisi akho.
â Okungenayo kwekhalenda nedatha ephathelene kusuka kule divayisi kuvumelaniswa ku-Google Khalenda. Ungasebenzisa i-Google Khalenda ukusesha, uhlele, ususe, futhi wabelane noxhumana nabo kusuka kunoma yimaphi amadivayisi akho.
Ukwenza idatha isipele ngeke kubalelwe kusitoreji sakho seDrayivu."
Ikhalenda, oxhumana nabo, izithombe, namavidiyo kuyavumelaniswa ku-akhawunti yakho ye-Google futhi kungasetshenziswa kuwo wonke amasevisi.
Isipele ngokuzenzakalela siqinisekisa ukuthi ukwazi ukubuyisela kalula noma ushintshe amafoni noma kunini. Funda kabanzi

"Lokhu kuzovala ukwenza isipele kwalokhu:
Izinhlelo zokusebenza nedatha yohlelo lokusebenza Umlando wekholi Izilungiselelo zedivayisi Izithombe namavidiyo I-SMS
Ikhalenda noxhumana nabo bazoqhubeka bavunyelaniswe ne-akhawunti yakho ye-Google. Uma ukusetha kuqediwe, ungashintsha izilungiselelo zokuvumelanisa ngokuya "Kuzilungiselelo > ama-akhawunti > i-Google.
"Izinhlelo zokusebenza nedatha yohlelo lokusebenza Ikhalenda Umlando wekholi Oxhumana nabo Izilungiselelo zedivayisi (ezifaka amaphasiwedi e-Wi-Fi) Izithombe namavidiyo I-SMS"
Amaphasiwedi akho asevele akhona e-%1$s abethelwe ngomushwana wakho wokungena. Uma ukhohlwe umushwana wakho wokungena, ima uphinde usethe kabusha ukuvumelanisa nge-Google Dashboard.
Asikho isiphequluli esitholakele ukuze sivule lesi sixhumanisi
Isipele sakho asinazo ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza
I-%1$s ngeke isebenze ngaphandle kokuthi unike amandla amasevisi we-Google Play.
I-%1$s ngeke ize iqalise ngaphandle kwamasevisi we-Google Play, angekho kusukela kudivayisi yakho.
%1$s inenkinga ngamasevisi e-Google Play. Sicela uzame futhi.
%1$s ngeke isebenze ngaphandle kwamasevisi e-Google Play, angasekelwa idivayisi yakho.
I-%1$s ngeke ize iqalise ngaphandle kokuthi ubuyekeze i-Google Play.
I-%1$s ngeke ize iqalise ngaphandle kwamasevisi we-Google Play, okwamanje abuyekezwayo.
Kudingeka inguqulo entsha yamasevisi we-Google Play. Izozibuyekeza ngokwayo maduze.
Amasevisi we-Google Play afakiwe we-architecture engalungile.
Amasevisi we-Google Play afakwe nge-architecture (%1$s) ehlukile kusukela ku-architecture yedivayisi yakho (%2$s).
Isibuki asikho ukuze kuboniswe i-url yangaphandle.
Ayikwazi ukuxhumeka ngoba idivayisi ayixhunyiwe ku-intanethi.
Ukuze uqhubeke, vula okuthi Izilungiselelo,Â nokuthi Izimvume, uphinde uvumela zonke izinto ezifakwe kuhlu.

"
%1$s Ukunika amandla, iya kokuthi Izilungiselelo > Izimvume > amasevisi e-Google Play"
Lolu hlelo lokusebenza ngeke lusebenze kahle ngaphandle uma uvumela amasevisi e-Google Play ukucela ukufinyelela okulandelayo:
Idivayisi yakho ye-Android ayixhunyiwe kusevisi yedatha. Ukuze ubuke lolu lwazi manje, vakashela i-%s ngesiphequluli sewebhu.
Idivayisi yakho ye-Android ayixhunyiwe kunethiwekhi ye-Wi-Fi. Ukuze ubuke lolu lwazi manje, vakashela i-%s ngesiphequluli sewebhu.
Oxhumana nabo be-Google, i-iCloudÂ® yokungu-%1$d, idivayisi yokungu-%2$d
Oxhumana nabo be-Google, i-SIM yabangu-%1$d, idivayisi yabangu-%2$d
Ukuqinisekiswa kunikeziwe. Qhubekela ekungeneni kudivayisi yakho yokuqala.
Uzokopisha idatha, efana ne-Akhawunti yakho ye-Google nezinhlelo zokusebenza kufoni yakho entsha
Idatha yakho ikopishelwa efonini yakho entsha. Unganqamula ikhebuli.
Ukhethe ukumisa ukukopisha, ngakho-ke enye kuphela idatha ekopishelwe efonini yakho entsha.
Ukhethe ukumisa ukukopisha, ngakho-ke akukho okukopishelwe efonini yakho entsha.
Okuthile akuhambanga kahle, ngakho-ke asikwazanga ukukopisha yonke into.
Okuthile akuhambanga kahle, ngakho-ke asikwazanga ukukopisha idatha yakho.
Uxhumekile efonini entsha. Ukuze uqhubeke, ixhume kabusha kweyakho yangaphambilini.
Le khebuli ayikwazi ukudlulisela idatha. Ixhume kabusha usebenzisa ikhebuli ehlukile bese uyazama futhi.
Qiniseka ukuthi ifoni yakho endaba ivuliwe, bese unqamule futhi uxhume ikhebuli
Njengoba idivayisi yakho ye-iPhoneÂ® iqashiwe, kuzomele ukhethe enye indlela yokukopisha idatha
Imicimbi edalwe kukhalenda ye-Google Calendar izovumelaniswa kuwo wonke amadivayisi angene ngemvume ku-akhawunti yakho ye-Google.
Ukwenza isipele kufaka phakathi idethi nokwamukwla nokuthunyelwa kwamakholi.
Oxhumana nabo abadalwe koxhumana nabo be-Google bazovumelaniswa kuwo wonke amadivayisi angene ngemvume ku-akhawunti yakho ye-Google.
Ukwenza isipele kufaka phakathi ukulungiswa kwedivayisi, njengesithombe sangemuva, amaphasiwedi e-WiFi, nezinhlelo zokusebenza zokuzenzakalela.
I-akhawunti yakho yokwenza isipele eyinhloko ishintshiwe. Futhi ungashintshela i-akhawunti yokwenza isipele yezithombe ze-Google kuya ku-%s.
Ukwenza isipele kufaka phakathi imilayezo ethunyelwe neyamukelwe. Lokhu akubandakanyi imidiya ye-MMS.

"Ukwenza isipele kubandakanya: \u0009- Izinhlelo zokusebenza nedatha yezinhlelo zokusebenza \u0009- Umlando wokushaya \u0009- Izilungiselelo zedivayisi (kufaka phakathi amaphasiwedi e-Wi-Fi) \u0009- Ikhalenda ye-Google \u0009- Oxhumana nabo be-Google \u0009- Izithombe namavidiyo \u0009- SMS"

"Isipele sibandakanya: \u0009- Izinhlelo zokusebenza nedatha yezinhlelo zokusebenza \u0009- Umlando wokushaya \u0009- Izilungiselelo zedivayisi (kufaka phakathi amaphasiwedi e-Wi-Fi) \u0009- I-Google Khalenda \u0009- Oxhumana nabo be-Google \u0009- SMS"

"Ikhalenda, oxhumana nabo, izithombe namavidiyo kuvumelaniswa ku-akhawunti yakho ye-Google futhi kungasetshenziswa kuwo wonke amasevisi.
Ukuvumelanisa kunganikwa amandla ngisho noma ukwenza isipele kuvaliwe. Izilungiselelo zokuvumelanisa zingashintshwa kokuthi izilungiselelo > Ama-akhawunti > Google."

"I-Google Khalenda noxhumana nabo be-Google bavumelaniswa ku-akhawunti yakho ye-Google futhi kungasetshenziswa kuwo wonke amasevisi.
Ukuvumelanisa kunganikwa amandla ngisho noma isipele sivaliwe. Izilungiselelo zokuvumelanisa zingashintshwa kokuthi Izilungiselelo > Ama-akhawunti > Google."
Isipele ngokuzenzakalela siqinisekisa ukuthi ungabuyisela kalula noma ushintshe amafoni noma kunini.

"Le datha eyenziwe isipele yale divayisi ku-Google Drayivu izosuswa unaphakade.
Izithombe namavidiyo asevele enziwe izipele asazotholakala ku-Google Drayivu.
I-Google Calendar noxhumana nabo be-Google bazoqhubeka nokuvumelanisa i-akhawunti yakho ye-Google. Izilungiselelo zokuvumelanisa zingashintshwa kuzilungiselelo > ama-akhawunti > Google."

"Idatha eyenziwe isipele yale divayisi ku-Google Drayivu izosuswa unaphakade.
I-Google Khalenda noxhumana nabo be-Google bazoqhubeka nokuvumelanisa ku-akhawunti yakho ye-Google. Izilungiselelo zokuvuelanisa zingashintshwa kokuthi Izilungiselelo > Ama-akhawunti > Google."

"Ukubethela kwesipele kuvulelwe idivayisi yakho ye-iPhoneÂ®. Uma ungazange uvule lokhu ngokwakho, kungenzeka ukuthi kuvulwe umlawuli wakho we-IT.
Izithombe kuphela, umculo, namavidiyo angakopishwa. Ukuze uthole olunye ulwazi, vakashela ku-"g.co/datatransferhelp.
Cindezela uphinde ubambe inkinobho kukhiye wakho okungenani amasekhondi angu-5 ukuze wenze isiqiniseko sokuthi ikumodi yokumatanisa
Ukhiye wakho wokuphepha usebenza kuphela uma i-Bluetooth yedivayisi yakho ivulekile
Ukuze usebenzise iningi lokhiye, vele uthephe inkinobho
Le phinikhodi yokumatanisa ivamise ukuba inombolo yamadijithi angu-4 noma angu-6 futhi ingaba ngemuva kokhiye wakho. Qhubeka uma ulungele ukufaka iphinikhodi.
Thola iphinikhodi yokumatanisa kwe-Bluetooth yokhiye wakho ongu-%1$s
Bhangqa ukhiye wakho kule divayisi ukuze uwusebenzise ne-akhawunti yakho
Cindezela uphinde ubambe inkinobho kukhiye wakho wokuvikela okungenani amasekhondi angu-5
Kusukela kuhlu olungezansi khetha ukhiye wokuvikela ofisa ukumatanisa idivayisi yakho nawo. Igama lingaphrintwa ngemuva kokhiye.
Ukhiye wakho wokuvikela usebenza kuphela uma kuvulwe i-NFC yedivayisi yakho
Bamba ukhiye wakho phansi umelene nemuva ledivayisi yakho ize iyeke ukudlidlizela
Okhiye bokuvikela basebenza ne-Bluetooth ne-NFC. Khetha ukuthi ufuna ukuwusebenzisa kanjani ukhiye wakho.
Khetha ukuthi uzosebenzisa kanjani ukhiye wakho wokuvikela
Ukusebenzisa ukhiye wakho wokuvikela ne-%1$s kusiza ukuvikela idatha yakho eyimfihlo.

"Thola i-adaptha yokushintsha ngokushesha eze ngebhokisi elilodwa ne-^1 yakho.
Xhuma ikhebuli ku-adaptha."
Vula ifoni yakho endala, bese uxhuma i-adaptha kule foni.
Uzothola okuqukethwe okuningi uma usebenzisa ikhebuli. Uma amakhebuli akubhokisi elingalingani, zama ukusebenzisa ikhebuli yokushaja noma yedatha esebenza nefoni yakho endala.
Sebenzisa ikhebuli elingana nefoni yakho endala, efana nekhebuli yakho yedatha noma eyokushaja.
Dlulisela idatha kusukela kufoni yakho endala ukuya kule ^1.

"Le kuyindlela esheshayo yokuletha idatha eningi.
Thola i-adaptha ebhokisini bese uyixhume efonini yakho entsha. Xhuma amafoni usebenzisa ikhebuli, bese uvula ifoni yakho endala."

"Ukuze uhlale uthola imilayezo ye-SMS kusukela kubasebenzisi bedivayisi ye-iPhoneÂ®, kuzomele uvale i-iMessageÂ®.
Vakashela ku-"g.co/iMessageHelp ukuze uthole imiyalelo.

"Esikrinini esilandelayo, ungangena ngemvume ku-akhawunti yakho ye-Google, noma udale entsha.
Uma ungangezi i-akhawunti yakho ye-Google, imicimbi yakho ye-iOS CalendarÂ® ngeke idluliseke."
[Okunamathiselwe komlayezo wakho kusezithombeni ze-Google > amafolda edivayisi > okunamathiselwe komlayezo]
[Okunye okunamathiselwe akukwazanga ukukopishwa. Okunamathiselwe okudluliselwe kungatholakala ezithombeni ze-Google > Amafolda edivayisi > Okunamathiselwe komlayezo]
[Okunamathiselwe kulondolozwe ezithombeni ze-Google > Amafolda edivayisi > Okunamathiselwe komlayezo]
[Okunamahtiselwe kulondolozwe ezithombeni ze-Google > Amafolda edivayisi > Okunamathiselwe komlayezo]

"Izithombe ezigcinwe ku-iCloudÂ® azikwazi ukukopishwa.
Ukuze ulethe lezi zithombe ku-^1 yakho, faka uhlelo lokusebenza lwezithombe ze-Google kudivayisi yakho ye-iPhoneÂ®, uphinde uvule ukwenza isipele nokuvumelanisa. Vakashela ku-"g.co/datatransferhelp ukuze uthole eminye imiyalelo.
Vula ukuze uqhubeke usethe ifoni yakho
Ngezizathu zokuvikela, uzodinga ukuqinisekisa ukukhiya isikrini kwakho ukuze uqhubeke ukusetha
"Vula i-SourceResponseActivity efonini yakho ukuze uqedele inqubo yokugunyaza. "
Ngokuqhubeka, wamukela imogomo yesevisi ye-Google Play. Funda kabanzi

"Uma uthepha isixhumanisi, i-Google Play ihlola uma ngabe kukhona uhlelo lokusebenza iphinde iyiqalise ngaphandle kokuyifaka. Izinhlelo zokusebenza ezisheshayo zigcinwa kudivayisi yakho okwesikhashana.
Izinhlelo zokusebenza ezisheshayo zicela izimvume njengoba uzisebenzisa. Imininingwane yohlelo lokusebenza efaka ukuthengwa kwangaphakathi nohlelo ingatholwa ku-Google Play Isitolo. Idatha yohlelo lokusebenza nezilungiselelo zivunyelaniswa kumadivayisi okungenwe ngawo ngemvume:"

"Uma uthepha isixhumanisi, i-Google Play iyahlola uma kukhona uhlelo lokusebenza olusheshayo futhi ilusebenzisa ngaphandle kokufakwa. Izinhlelo zokusebenza ezisheshayo zigcinwa kudivayisi yakho okwesikhashana.
Imininingwane yohlelo lokusebenza, efaka ukuthenga ngaphakathi nohlelo, ingatholwa ku-Google Play Isitolo. Idatha yohlelo lokusebenza nezilungiselelo zivunyelaniswa kumadivayisi okungenwe ngawo ngemvume:"
Ukuze unike izimvume, ngena ngemvume futhi.
Ayikho i-akhawunti okwamanje egcina izithombe ezenziwe isipele
Oxhumana nabo abakopishiwe bazolondolozwa ku-akhawunti yakho ye-Google.
Oxhumana nabo abakopishiwe namakhalenda azolondolozwa ku-akhawunti yakho ye-Google.
Enye idatha yakho kungenzeka ingakopishelwa ku-^1 yakho. Funda kabanzi
Susa ukukhetha okunye okuqukethwe ukuze uqhubeke

"Enye idatha kusukela kufoni yakho endala ayikwazi ukukopishwa ngokuzenzakalela:
â Ukulandwa (okufana namafayela e-PDF)
â Izithombe, amavidiyo nomculo ogcinwe kumafolda afihliwe
â Izithombe, amavidiyo nomculo otholwe ngomlayezo wombhalo
â Izinhlelo zokusebenza ezingaveli ku-Google Play Isitolo
â Idatha yohlelo lokusebenza (uma uhlelo lokusebenza lingasebenzisi ukwenza isipele se-Android)
â Izilungiselelo ezithile zedivayisi
â Amanye ama-akhawunti ngaphandle kwama-akhawunti e-Google (kanye nanoma iyiphi idatha ehlotshaniswayo)
â Oxhumana nabo namakhalenda avunyelaniswe kumasevisi angaphandle kwe-Google
â Amathoni okukhala
Ukuze uthole eminye imininingwane nosizo lokukopisha enye yale datha, vakashela ku-g.co/datatransferhelp."

"Enye idatha kusukela kufoni yakho endala ayikwazi ukukopishwa ngokuzenzakalela:
â Idatha yezinhlelo zokusebenza neyohlelo lokusebenza
â Izithombe lapho okwangempela kungagciniwe kufoni yakho (isibonelo, uma kuvulwe isilungiselelo sokulungiselela isitoreji, izithombe zangempela zigcinwa ku-iCloudÂ®)

Njengephasiwedi, amakhukhi we-Isikhombi Sesikhathi (SID) kanye ne-Isikhombi Sesikhathi Sasendaweni (LSID) ahlanganisa ubunikazi bakho nochungechunge lwezicelo kusukela kusiphequluli. Avumela ukufinyelela okuphelele kuyo yonke idatha yakho ye-akhawunti. Iziphequluli kuphela ezinokusetshenziswa okulungile kulawo makhukhi.
Sebenzisa amakhukhi we-SID kanye ne-LSID ukuthola ukufinyelela kuyo yonke idatha yakho ye-akhawunti ye-Google.
"Idivayisi yakho iye yanqanyulwa. Ukuze uqhubeke nokusetha, ixhume bese uqala kabusha."

Ukuthepha uphinde uhambe kusebenzisa i-NFC ukuze kukopishe ama-Akhawunti wakho we-Google, izinhlelo zokusebenza, nedatha kusuka kwenye idivayisi yakho. Qiniseka ukuthi i-NFC yedivayisi ivuliwe ngokuya kokuthi Izilungiselelo.

Uhlelo lokusebenza lwe-Google luza lufakwe ngaphambili kuwo wonke amadivayisi we-Android. Thinta inkinobho ye-\"Zonke izinhlelo zokusebenza\" kusikrini sakho sasekhaya uphinde ubheke isithonjana esiboniswe ngaphezulu.
